data.message: I have been having trouble with Facebook from my laptop since about March 17th or so.  It has been all kinds of issues not just one particular thing.  I have tried Microsoft Edge, Internet Explorer, Chrome and Firefox and they are all having a variety of issues.  Trouble loading pictures.  When I click on create event, the pop up just spins and doesn't load, etc.  I've googled some of the issues and I've seen lots of comments of others having trouble with all kinds of things the last couple of weeks.  What is going on??

replies.message: Hi, Shelley. Thanks for letting us know. Please help us track these issues & submit the problem through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2oowE2X. -Krista
